text: @calvinzbest1 Ask her if she wears a seatbelt when she drives, or brushes her teeth daily, or cooks eggs before eating them. The incidence of #COVID19 is 20-40 times that of the flu, so she is more likely to get the disease that can be deadly in 5%.
